TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户使用该控件可以编辑关联 控件的几个用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是派生自类的编辑器控件 ，用于编辑影响关联或控件行为的属性 。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated or control. 正如 Web 部件控件集中的面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述) ，其中包含 (工具部件的面向工具的部件控件) ，并且每个工具部分必须位于特定类型的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 部件控件集中的工具部件具有两个区分特征：Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是帮助用户控件，使最终用户能够个性化 Web 部件页面上的控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它们仅在某些显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain display modes. 控件是一种仅在 Web 部件页面处于编辑模式时，以及在 选择特定控件进行编辑的情况下变为可见的工具部件。The control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 与所有其他 控件一样，控件位于 控件中。The control, like all other controls, resides in an control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含 控件，而 不能将控件置于任何其他类型的区域中。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 在某些情况下，该控件不会显示在该页上。The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions. 如果 正在编辑的控件的属性值 为 `true` ，且该页处于用户个性化设置范围 (默认) ，则不会显示该控件。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 为了使 控件在此方案中显示，通常需要执行两个步骤：For the control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - 将条目添加到 Web.config 文件中，该文件向授权用户提供编辑共享个性化设置范围中的网页的权限 (这意味着，用户所做的更改将对应用程序) 的所有用户可见。Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application). - 使用方法，以编程方式在运行时将页面从用户级别更改为共享级别的个性化设置范围 。Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the method. 有关如何使 控件在页中可见的示例，请参阅本主题的 "示例" 部分。For an example of how to make the control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic. 有关共享控件和个性化设置范围的详细信息，请参阅 [Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). 类还具有一个重要的方法， 它从 类继承并重写。The class also has an important method, , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法非常重要，因为它允许从正在编辑的控件获取属性值 并将其分配给编辑控件的字段。The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control. 在大多数情况下， 控件应在页持久性格式中使用，方法是在元素内声明一个元素 `` `` ，该元素又包含在网页中的 `` 元素内。In most cases, the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 控件使最终用户能够编辑控件的以下 UI 属性 ：The control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a control: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要编辑控件的其他属性和行为 ，可以使用 随 Web 部件控件集提供的其他控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括 、 和 控件。These controls include the , the , and the control. 提供的 控件应提供编辑控件所需的大多数编辑功能 ，但也可以通过从类继承来创建自定义编辑器控件 。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅 类概述。For a code example, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性， 控件在元素中呈现 `
` 。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素对用于在控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组 ，并为视觉用户代理 (（例如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理 (如屏幕阅读软件) 等）中的控件提供选项卡式导航。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上声明控件，并使其能够编辑控件的多个 UI 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 ，用于编辑控件的行为属性 。A Web page that contains an control and a control, which is used to edit the behavior properties of a control. - 要在 Web.config 文件中创建的条目，以向授权用户提供在共享个性化设置范围中编辑页面的权限。An entry to make in the Web.config file to give an authorized user permission to edit the page in shared personalization scope. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 此用户控件的文档介绍了如何调用 方法将页切换为共享模式，从而使 控件能够显示。The documentation for this user control explains how to call the method to switch the page into shared mode, which enables the control to appear. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含对控件的声明性引用 ，其中包含一个子 `` 元素，其中包含对控件的声明性引用 。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to a control. 请注意，此页还包含 绑定到 Pubs 数据库的控件; 因为此控件驻留在中，因此 它能够作为 可以由控件编辑的控件 。Note that the page also contains a control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a , it is able to function as a control that can be edited by the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是 Web.config 文件中的条目。The third part of the example is an entry in the Web.config file. 你必须在文件的部分中生成类似于以下内容的条目 `` ，以允许授权用户或一组用户在网页位于共享个性化设置范围时编辑该网页。You must make an entry like the following in the `` section of the file, to enable an authorized user or set of users to edit the Web page when it is in shared personalization scope. 此条目是一个关键步骤;否则，在将 页面切换到编辑模式时，控件将不可见。This entry is a critical step; otherwise, the control will not be visible when you switch the page into edit mode. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以先在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**共享**" 选项。When you load the page in a browser, you can first select the **Shared** option on the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 接下来，单击下拉列表，然后选择 " **编辑模式** "，将页面切换到编辑模式。Next, click the drop-down list itself, and select **Edit Mode** to switch the page into edit mode. 可以在 " **创作列表" Web 部件** 控件的标题栏中 (向下箭头) 单击谓词菜单，然后单击 " **编辑** " 开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到 控件，并在其上方显示一个按钮和文本框。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改，并单击 " **应用** " 按钮，则可以使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件将页面返回到浏览模式，并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 创建该类的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数 ，因此在创建类的新实例时，不会执行任何特殊任务。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. 通常不需要使用构造函数，因为你可以 在设计时以声明方式向页面添加控件。Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a control to a page declaratively at design time. 但是，如果 出于某种原因需要以编程方式添加控件，则可以使用 构造函数。However, if you need to add a control programmatically for some reason, you can use the constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on a control. 此方法的目的是将用户在控件上设置的值保存 到关联控件中的相应属性 。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 关联的控件在 控件的继承属性中引用 。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. 此 方法尝试设置关联控件上 (UI) 相关属性值的多个用户界面 。The method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated control. 有关在此方法中设置的属性值的列表，请参阅类概述中的备注 。For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the class overview. 当用户单击 "确定" 谓词或编辑 UI 中的 "应用" 谓词时，将调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.

exception.span: 尝试设置关联 控件的属性值时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }

Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String

member this.DefaultButton : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件默认按钮的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.

value.span: 包含默认按钮 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以设置属性上的多个特性。The property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property. 此属性不能与主题一起使用，并且不能通过设计时用户界面 (UI) 浏览。The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI). 从基属性值检索属性的值。The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的值为 `true` ，这意味着将显示控件（一种情况除外）。The property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case. 如果 正在编辑的控件的属性值 为 `true` ，且该页处于用户个性化设置范围 (默认) ，则不会显示该控件。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 有关所需步骤的说明，以及演示如何使 控件显示以便进行编辑的代码示例，请参阅 类概述和代码示例。For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the control to be displayed for editing, see the class overview and code example. Web 部件控制集的设计假设：共享控件--对所有用户可见的控件-仅当页面位于共享个性化设置范围中时，才可见，这意味着编辑更改对所有用户都可见。The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 从 控件检索属性值并将这些属性值分配给关联 控件。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on a control. 它实现基类中的 方法，检索关联控件中的当前值 ，并使用这些值更新控件中的控件， 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 只要关联控件中的值发生更改，就会调用方法 。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于 控件， 包含控件的区域将调用 方法，以使控件中的值 始终与关联控件中的值同步 。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在编辑模式中可见时，属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 在页面中声明控件时，可以为属性设置一个值 `Title` 。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则使用特定于区域性的默认值来描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件的 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码演示如何 在网页中以声明方式设置控件的标题。The following code shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的下一部分演示如何以编程方式设置属性的值 。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以在 " **创作列表" Web 部件** 控件的标题栏中 (向下箭头) 单击谓词菜单，然后单击 " **编辑** " 开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到 控件，并在其上方显示一个按钮和文本框。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 请注意，控件的标题 是在网页的声明性标记中分配给它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果在 " **更新 EditorPart 标题** " 按钮旁边的文本框中输入一些文本，然后单击按钮，则会更新控件的标题。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
